title: Conviction
description: Kelly discovers his power fueling a deadly spell that puts everyone in danger.After trying to get his mind off of his taboo crush on his best friend’s older brother, Kelly’s idea for a relaxing ski vacation goes all wrong when they become stranded. Surrounded by a blizzard powered by Kelly’s own magic, with bodies falling around them from a killer on a rampage, everyone is pointing an accusation at Kelly.Determined to stop the spell, Kelly ventures out into the storm, ready to face a monster of their past, even while he expects to die trying to save them all.This MM romance, dark urban fantasy, featuring a male witch, age gap lovers, power bottoms, and lots of cuddling by the fire when not racing after monsters into a snowstorm.
author: Lissa Kasey
